title: A third address directed to his Excellency the Lord Generall Cromwell, and the Right Honourable the Councell of State sitting at White-Hall Being the humble petition of Lieutenant-Colonell John Lilburne prisoner in Newgate.
author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb dwelling in Thamestreet over against Baynards Castle,
